title: Nepal: 2025 Encephalitis
summary: So far, 17 infections - 10 women and seven men - have been reported in the district. Three of the patients are under 15 years of age, five are between 15 and 60, and nine are above 60. Fifteen of the infected individuals had not been vaccinated, vector control officer Ram KC said.
description:
Source: https://thehimalayantimes.com/health...six-in-chitwan

Japanese encephalitis death toll rises to six in Chitwan

By THT Online

Published: 04:08 pm Oct 08, 2025

CHITWAN, OCTOBER 8

The death toll from Japanese Encephalitis (JE) in Chitwan district has climbed to six since mid-July, according to the District Health Office.

title: Iran: 2025 Dengue
summary: Iran faces new dengue outbreak as Aedes mosquito spreads across southern regions. More than 1,000 suspected cases and 50 confirmed infections, state media reported. Surge reignited concern over the spread of Aedes mosquitoes thriving in stagnant urban water amid persistent heat. Authorities warned that the situation represents both a public health and biological threat.

title: DRC - Viral hemorrhagic fever cases, deaths (including health workers) in Bulape, Kasai province - August 20, 2025 - Ebola Zaire confirmed
summary: The Ebola virus disease (EVD) outbreak in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC) shows signs of containment. No new confirmed or probable cases reported since our last update (Situation Report #3) However, one death, a 3-week-old neonate, was reported among hospitalized confirmed cases. If no new cases are reported, the country will commence the 42-day countdown to declare the end of the outbreak.
description:
Publications

WHO: Ebola situation report DRC/25/04 - 05 October, 2025

The Ebola virus disease (EVD) outbreak in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC) shows signs of containment, with no new confirmed or probable cases reported since our last update (Situation Report #3).

title: France - Surveillance of dengue, chikungunya and Zika in metropolitan France 2025
summary: As of October 6, 2025, 87 outbreaks of indigenous vector transmission of chikungunya and dengue fever and a total of 737 cases have been identified in mainland France. 44 human cases of vector-borne West Nile virus infection. The affected regions are Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur, Occitanie, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, and, for the first time, Île-de-France and Auvergne-Rhône-alpes.

title: Israel & Hamas War - Not a political thread - Rpts of 100s dead 1st day - Oct. 7, 2023 - to Lebanon: Sept. 17, 2024 - Now Iran too, Oct. 1, 2024 - Syria & Russia, Oct.3, 2024 - to full war between Israel & Iran, 6/2025 + US, ceasefire announced
summary: An estimated 64,000 children, including at least 1,000 babies, have been killed or maimed in the Gaza Strip over the past two years. At least 14 children have reportedly been killed since Saturday morning as Gaza City and other parts of the enclave continue to be hit by intense Israeli bombardment and artillery fire.

Posted on October 8, 2025

Statement by Catherine Russell, Executive Director of UNICEF.

New York, October 8, 2025 – “For more than 700 days, children in Gaza have been killed, maimed, and displaced by a devastating war that undermines our common humanity.
